timeline.message: enforce maven version must greater than 3.6

timeline.bodyText:
This makes you need to update the compiling doc
https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/How-to-build.md#build-from-github
timeline.author: wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -383,12 +383,16 @@
                         <goals>
                             <goal>enforce</goal>
                         </goals>
+                        <phase>validate</phase>
                         <configuration>
                             <rules>
                                 <requireJavaVersion>
                                     <!-- Build has not yet been updated for Java 9+ -->
                                     <version>1.8</version>
                                 </requireJavaVersion>
+                                <requireMavenVersion>
+                                    <version>3.6</version>

replies.bodyText:
At least 3 places should be updated.

Prepare git, JDK8, and Maven 3.6+
Add document about compiling a single plugin in the Advanced compile part.
Remove Setup your Eclipse IDE section, it is out of the update.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Done, Please help to check (my poor english)
replies.author: xbkaishui

timeline.message: update build doc to support maven3.6+
